companies.name: GitLab
companies.description: GitLab is a completely free application to code, test, and deploy code together, both for public and private projects. It provides Git repository management with fine grained access controls, code reviews, issue tracking, activity feeds, wikis, and continuous integration.

companies.name: FlyByte
companies.description: Connect you with what you want, when you want: this is the objective of Flybyte. Much more than allow access to the internet, the Fly Team search always abreast of the new technologies available to increase your world of possibilities connections. The Flybyte was born in 2008 with the aim of bringing internet quality to the city of Taquara. Since then we expanded our coverage area and today serve four municipalities of Vale do Paranhana. The excellence in service, the signal stability and personalized support 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, are our advantages. We know the needs and seek to meet our customers, the Flys, quickly and effectively. Flybyte, connections your way. Simple like that.

companies.name: Infisc
companies.description: Taquara company focused on developing software for Web, using mostly technologies J2EE platform, facing the Municipal Public Sector. It pioneered in the South, with the development and implementation of the first "Invoice Electronic Services" in the city of Campo Bom (2007), and innovative in the implementation of "granting of credits program linked to ISSQN" in the city of Farroupilha (2011). Innovation in technology is our wave!

companies.name: GitHub
companies.description: GitHub is how people build software. With a community of more than 14 million people, developers can discover, use, and contribute to over 35 million projects using a powerful collaborative development workflow. Whether using GitHub.com or your own instance of GitHub Enterprise, you can integrate GitHub with third party tools, from project management to continuous deployment, to build software in the way that works best for you.
